snippet: The automaker, which has lagged behind other automakers in developing a strategy for in-car infotainment, said the deficiency would be rectified with help from Aha.
abstract: The automaker, which has lagged behind other automakers in developing a strategy for in-car infotainment, said the deficiency would be rectified with help from Aha.

headline.main: Honda Readies an App Offensive for HondaLink, Its Telematics System
